The standard keyboard key codes

Copyright (C) 2011 Nikolay Nemshilov

Event.Keys =
  BACKSPACE: 8
  TAB:       9
  ENTER:    13
  ESC:      27
  SPACE:    32
  PAGEUP:   33
  PAGEDOWN: 34
  END:      35
  HOME:     36
  LEFT:     37
  UP:       38
  RIGHT:    39
  DOWN:     40
  INSERT:   45
  DELETE:   46
